previous.excerpt:
I love a good midsize stock. They are beyond the uncertainty of being very small
and have proven themselves a fair bit.

Yet, they still have a lot of potential to multiply as they are still not too
large.

I have seen so many companies go from 6bn to 30bn (and more) over just a few
years (and I…

localize.title: 你最喜欢的100亿市值以下的股票
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我喜欢好的中盘股。它们超越了很小的不确定性。
并已经证明了自己的实力。

然而，它们仍有很大的繁殖潜力，因为它们还没有太多
大。

localize.title: 你最喜歡的100億市值以下的股票

然而，它們仍有很大的繁殖潛力，因爲它們還沒有太多
大。
